interface.name: iptables_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute iptables in the iptables domain.

interface.name: iptables_run
interface.summary: Execute iptables in the iptables domain, and allow the specified role the iptables domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the iptables domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the iptables domain to use.

interface.name: iptables_exec
interface.summary: Execute iptables in the caller domain.
